text: How long does the vectors typically get? Could you get away with tuples instead of vectors to avoid the many allocations? Alternatively, preallocate arrays and use sizehint or send the current size along

elements.text: How long does the vectors typically get? Could you get away with tuples instead of vectors to avoid the many allocations? Alternatively, preallocate arrays and use sizehint or send the current size along

text: Maybe, but I don't think vector properties are used much, the arrays are mostly for storage. The changing type that comes with varying sizes of any of tuples or static arrays might be problematic though, so maybe preallocate  standard vectors is better in the end
